svg.title: Test that changing conditional processing attributes dynamically on outer 'svg' elements while redraw is suspended is honored
svg.script: function f() { var svg = document.documentElement; svg.suspendRedraw(10000); setTimeout(function() { svg.removeAttribute("requiredFeatures"); svg.unsuspendRedrawAll(); setTimeout(function() { svg.removeAttribute("class"); }, 1); }, 1); }
